duties_responsibilities.duty: Follow care plans established by the Registered Nurse and ensure a culture of safety and focus for excellence.
Promote cohesive work teams and collaborate with other departments to provide patient-centered care.
Participate in department and organizational education programs and professional initiatives.
Identify and utilize resources for safe delivery of patient care, report malfunctioning/expired equipment, and ensure proper cleaning and storage of work areas and equipment.
Attend training and education required for the position, keep up to date with clinicals, communication and computer skills, and maintain certifications.
Meet all other duties as required.

education_certification.credential: Certified Nursing Assistant (CNA) program completion, or first year of Nursing School Program and successful CNA exam.
Certified as a Nursing Assistant by the State of Maryland and be on the State of Maryland registry, or be a certified Emergency Medical Technician (EMT).
Active American Heart Association Basic Life Support (BLS) certification.
